data.name: plAddRole.Help
data.value: To add an available role to the Assigned Roles grid above, select the desired role from the drop-down list then click the 'Add' button to the right.

data.name: plAssignedDisplayName.Help
data.value: Enter a display name to be assigned to the recipient when the invitation is accepted.

data.name: plAssignedRoles.Help
data.value: To assign one or more non-automatic security roles that will be applied to the recipient's account when the invitation is accepted, first select an available role from the drop-down list and click the 'Add' button. You may also click on a role that is already assigned in the below list to edit its effective and expires date and set the website page to which the recipient will be redirected when logging in for the first time.

data.name: plAssignedUsername.Help
data.value: Enter a username to be assigned to the recipient when the invitation is accepted.

data.name: plPersonalNote.Help
data.value: Enter a personal note (optional) to be included in the invitation emailed to the recipient.

data.name: plRecipientEmail.Help
data.value: Enter the invitation recipient's email address. If the address is not valid, the recipient will not be able to receive the invitation.

data.name: plRecipientEmail2.Help
data.value: Enter the recipient's email address to confirm that you have entered it correctly above.

data.name: plRecipientFirstName.Help
data.value: Enter the invitation recipient's first name.

data.name: plRecipientLastName.Help
data.value: Enter the invitation recipient's last name.

data.name: plTemporaryPassword.Help
data.value: Enter a temporary password that will be assigned to the recipient's account when the invitation is accepted. The new user may change the temporary password to one of his/her choosing at a later date. Alternatively you may generate a temporary password containing random characters by checking the "Generate Random Password" checkbox.

data.name: valAssignedUsername.RegexInvalid
data.value: The assigned username does not conform to the character pattern required by this website.

data.name: valAssignedUsername.Required
data.value: You must enter a username that will be assigned to the recipient's account when the invitation is accepted.

data.name: valRecipientEmail.RegexInvalid
data.value: The entered email does not contain an acceptable pattern of characters.

data.name: valRecipientEmail.Required
data.value: A valid email address for the recipient is required.

data.name: valRecipientEmail2.CompareInvalid
data.value: The second entry of the recipient's email does not match the first entry.

data.name: valRecipientEmail2.Required
data.value: You must enter the recipient's email address a second time for confirmation.

data.name: valTemporaryPassword.RegexInvalid
data.value: The temporary password you entered does not meet the requirements of this website for a secure password. Use additional characters including numbers and punctuation marks to make it more secure.

data.name: valTemporaryPassword.Required
data.value: You must enter a temporary password that wil lbe assigned to the recipient's account when the invitation is accepted.

data.name: valTemporaryPassword2.CompareInvalid
data.value: The confirmation entry does not match the temporary password you entered above.

data.name: valTemporaryPassword2.Required
data.value: You must retype the temporary password you entered above as confirmation of its entry.

data.name: plTemporaryPassword2.Help
data.value: You must re-enter the temporary password as confirmation.

data.name: valRecipientFirstName.Required
data.value: You must enter the recipient's first name.

data.name: valRecipientLastName.Required
data.value: You must enter the recipient's last name.

data.name: plRecipientCultureCode.Help
data.value: In a multi-language site you may select the recipient's preferred language allowing the emailed invitation text to appear in that language.

data.name: plRedirectOnFirstLogin.Help
data.value: Select a site page to which the user will be redirected following successful login for the first time. Note if a page is not selected or if the roles to be assigned to the recipient do not permit access to this page, the user will be redirect to the site's home page.

data.name: InvitationAllocationExceeded.Error
data.value: You have no more invitations available to send out of your allocation of {0} every {1}. Please come back later or contact this site's administrator to increase your allocation.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.Success
data.value: Your invitation has been successfully sent to the recipient!

data.name: plInvitedByUserEmail.Help
data.value: Enter your own email address. If the address is not valid, you will not be able to track the status of the invitation.

data.name: val2InvitedByUserEmail.RegexInvalid
data.value: The email address that you entered for yourself does not contain an acceptible pattern of characters.

data.name: valInvitedByUserEmail.Required
data.value: You must enter your own email address.

data.name: valAssignedDisplayName.Required
data.value: You must enter a display name that will be assigned to the recipient's account when the invitation is accepted.

data.name: valAssignedDisplayName.RegexInvalid
data.value: The display name does not conform to the allowed character pattern or contains prohibited terms.

data.name: ModerationRequired.Text
data.value: Your invitation has been created but requires approval by a moderator before it will be automatically sent to the recipient.

data.name: plInvitedByUserFullName.Help
data.value: Enter your full name which will appear in the invitation.

data.name: valInvitedByUserFullName.Required
data.value: You must enter your full name.
